contest-event.event-date:
April 4, 1976 D York & District BBA Contest (2nd Section)
York & District BBA Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest York & District BBA Contest york-district-bba-contest-2nd-section
York College of Further Education, Tadcaster Road, York
March contest - 1st Scarborough, 2nd Beverley, 3rd joint between Askern Colliery and Ackton Hall Colliery. Hymn tune contest held in conjunction with First Section - 1st Kirbymoorside, 2nd York Railway Inst, 3rd Rowntree Mackintosh. 18th annual contest.
May 20, 2013, 7:55 a.m. May 20, 2013, 8:01 a.m.
1 Scarborough Town D. Clegg
2 Askern Colliery Band Fred Lowery
3 Ackton Hall Colliery Band D. Metcalfe
Unknown Result Beverley Brass H. G. Crouch
Unknown Result Shepherd Group Band D. Carson
